titles.title: White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013
White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013
White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013
A bill to designate additional segments and tributaries of White Clay Creek, in the States of Delaware and Pennsylvania, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Wyden without amendment. With written report No. 113-31.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 62.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The expanded summary of the Senate reported version is repeated here.)
White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic River Expansion Act of 2013 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate additional segments and tributaries of the White Clay Creek in Delaware and Pennsylvania as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
Applies the White Clay Creek Wild and Scenic Rivers System Act to such additional segments and tributaries of White Clay Creek.
